meanings.definition: In a way that is capable of being molded or shaped
meanings.sent1: The clay was shaped plastically into a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent2: She plastically molded the dough into various shapes for the cookies.
meanings.sent3: The Play-Doh was plastically transformed into a mini sculpture.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were plastically molded by the new information she received.
meanings.sent5: The artist plastically crafted the clay into a lifelike figure.

meanings.definition: In a way that is able to be deformed without breaking
meanings.sent1: The material could be plastically bent into different shapes.
meanings.sent2: The plastic ruler plastically flexed without snapping.
meanings.sent3: The balloon plastically stretched as it was inflated.
meanings.sent4: His mind plastically adapted to the new concept without resistance.
meanings.sent5: The rubber band plastically expanded to accommodate the stack of papers.

meanings.definition: In a way that is easily influenced or changed
meanings.sent1: Her opinion plastically shifted after hearing the persuasive argument.
meanings.sent2: The young minds plastically absorbed the information presented.
meanings.sent3: The weather plastically altered our plans for the day.
meanings.sent4: His mood plastically changed when he received the good news.
meanings.sent5: The group's decision was plastically swayed by the charismatic leader.
